atlantis.engine.graphics

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlantis.engine.graphics.BaseEntity
      • atlantis.engine.graphics.Entity
        • atlantis.engine.graphics.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrawable, IUpdateable

    public class Sprite
extends Entity
    A class that represent a sprite object that can be have animations and some physics.
    Author:
    Yannick
